Title: Ep #12591 Thursday 14 May
Plot: Stefano and Marlena revisit their past. Stefano decides she must die for what she did to Kristen. Roman and Abe enlist Chad to help save Marlena. Daniel wants to work on things with Nicole. She continues to put him off so she can get the goods on Serena.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
